issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: appcd-core
components.description: Core daemon logic: config, plugin loader, logging, dispatcher

fields.description:
We want to bump the Node.js version of appcd-core's {{package.json}} to the latest v8.x LTS release once it ships in October 2017.

In addition, the following dependencies must also be updated to take advantage of the new features of Node 8:

* appcd-http: koa-bodyparser@4.0.0
fields.summary: appcd-core: Bump Node version to 8.x (when it is released)
